# Here are a few plants that are native to Ithaca {.tabset}

## Trees

* Tsuga canadensis
* Pinus strobus
* Acer saccharum
* Acer rubrum
* Acer negundo
* Nyssa sylvatica
* Quercus alba
* Quercus velutina
* Quercus montana
* Quercus coccinea
* Quercus bicolor
* Liriodendron tulipifera

## Spring ephemerals

* Trillium grandiflorum
* Trillium erectum
* Cardamine diphylla
* Dicentra canadensis
* Dicentra cucullaria
* Hepatica nobilis var. acuta
* Hepatica nobilis var. obtusa
* Claytonia caroliniana

## Carnivorous plants

* Drosera rotundifolia
* Sarracenia purpurea
* Pinguicula vulgaris
